languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, мне тут говорят, что принадлежность корабля наши авгуры определить не могут. Если обобщить: неопознанное судно с сильными повреждениями находится в астероидном поясе вблизи колонии Райкади Филия, а его экипаж отказывается от помощи, которую им, к слову, еще никто не предлагал".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, мне тут говорят, что принадлежность корабля наши авгуры определить не могут. Если обобщить: неопознанное судно с сильными повреждениями находится в астероидном поясе вблизи колонии Райкади Филия, а его экипаж отказывается от помощи, которую им, к слову, еще никто не предлагал".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, I am told our augurs cannot determine the allegiance of the vessel. To be brief, there is an unidentified and badly damaged vessel within an asteroid field near the Rykadi Philia colony that is refusing help... Which, not to put too fine a point on it, has not yet been offered to them."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, мне тут говорят, что принадлежность корабля наши авгуры определить не могут. Если обобщить: неопознанное судно с сильными повреждениями находится в астероидном поясе вблизи колонии Райкади Филия, а его экипаж отказывается от помощи, которую им, к слову, еще никто не предлагал".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I am told our augurs cannot determine the allegiance of the vessel. To sum everything up, there is an unidentified and badly damaged vessel within an asteroid field near Rykadi Philia colony that is refusing help... Which, not to put too fine a point on it, has not been offered to them yet."

To sum everything up, there is an unidentified and badly damaged vessel within an asteroid field near Rykadi Philia colony that is refusing help... Which, not to put too fine a point on it, has not been offered to them yet."

To be brief, there is an unidentified and badly damaged vessel within an asteroid field near the Rykadi Philia colony that is refusing help... Which, not to put too fine a point on it, has not yet been offered to them."

Which, not to put too fine a point on it, has not yet been offered to them."

"Lord Captain, I am told our augurs cannot determine the allegiance of the vessel. To be brief, there is an unidentified and badly damaged vessel within an asteroid field near the Rykadi Philia colony that is refusing help... Which, not to put too fine a point on it, has not yet been offered to them."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, on me signale que nos augures ne parviennent pas à identifier le pavillon d'allégeance du vaisseau. Pour résumer la situation, un astronef non identifié et gravement endommagé est en perdition dans un champ d'astéroïdes non loin de la colonie de Rykadi Philia, et son équipage refuse qu'on lui porte assistance... Une assistance qui, est-il bon de le rappeler, ne leur a été proposée à aucun moment. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am told our augurs cannot determine the allegiance of the vessel. To be brief, there is an unidentified and badly damaged vessel within an asteroid field near the Rykadi Philia colony that is refusing help... Which, not to put too fine a point on it, has not yet been offered to them."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, on me signale que nos augures ne parviennent pas à identifier le pavillon d'allégeance du vaisseau. Pour résumer la situation, un astronef non identifié et gravement endommagé est en perdition dans un champ d'astéroïdes non loin de la colonie de Rykadi Philia, et son équipage refuse qu'on lui porte assistance... Une assistance qui, est-il bon de le rappeler, ne leur a été proposée à aucun moment. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, unsere Auguren können nicht feststellen, zu wem das Schiff gehört. Kurz gesagt: Ein nicht identifiziertes und schwer beschädigtes Schiff liegt in einem Asteroidenfeld in der Nähe der Kolonie Rykadi Philia und weigert sich, Hilfe anzunehmen ... Welche, um das geradeheraus zu sagen, ihm auch noch gar nicht angeboten wurde."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am told our augurs cannot determine the allegiance of the vessel. To be brief, there is an unidentified and badly damaged vessel within an asteroid field near the Rykadi Philia colony that is refusing help... Which, not to put too fine a point on it, has not yet been offered to them."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, unsere Auguren können nicht feststellen, zu wem das Schiff gehört. Kurz gesagt: Ein nicht identifiziertes und schwer beschädigtes Schiff liegt in einem Asteroidenfeld in der Nähe der Kolonie Rykadi Philia und weigert sich, Hilfe anzunehmen ... Welche, um das geradeheraus zu sagen, ihm auch noch gar nicht angeboten wurde."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, me han informado de que los augures no son capaces de determinar la propiedad de la nave. Para resumir, hay una nave muy dañada y sin identificar cerca del campo de un asteroide cercano a la colonia Rykadi Philia que se niega a recibir ayuda... Empezando porque todavía no se les ha ofrecido».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am told our augurs cannot determine the allegiance of the vessel. To be brief, there is an unidentified and badly damaged vessel within an asteroid field near the Rykadi Philia colony that is refusing help... Which, not to put too fine a point on it, has not yet been offered to them."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, me han informado de que los augures no son capaces de determinar la propiedad de la nave. Para resumir, hay una nave muy dañada y sin identificar cerca del campo de un asteroide cercano a la colonia Rykadi Philia que se niega a recibir ayuda... Empezando porque todavía no se les ha ofrecido».

languages.text: “舰长大人，俄歇矩阵班组报告无法确定这艘船是否忠于帝国。简而言之，在莱卡德菲利亚星殖民地附近的小行星区里，有一艘身份不明且严重受损的飞船正在发报，拒绝接受任何救援……另外说一句，他们现在甚至还没有得到任何援助。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am told our augurs cannot determine the allegiance of the vessel. To be brief, there is an unidentified and badly damaged vessel within an asteroid field near the Rykadi Philia colony that is refusing help... Which, not to put too fine a point on it, has not yet been offered to them."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，俄歇矩阵班组报告无法确定这艘船是否忠于帝国。简而言之，在莱卡德菲利亚星殖民地附近的小行星区里，有一艘身份不明且严重受损的飞船正在发报，拒绝接受任何救援……另外说一句，他们现在甚至还没有得到任何援助。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、我々の予言者は船の所属を特定できないそうです。手短に申しますと、ライカディ・フィリア・コロニー近くの小惑星帯にひどく損傷した未確認の船があり、救助を拒否しています…救援を申し出てもいないにもかかわらず」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am told our augurs cannot determine the allegiance of the vessel. To be brief, there is an unidentified and badly damaged vessel within an asteroid field near the Rykadi Philia colony that is refusing help... Which, not to put too fine a point on it, has not yet been offered to them."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、我々の予言者は船の所属を特定できないそうです。手短に申しますと、ライカディ・フィリア・コロニー近くの小惑星帯にひどく損傷した未確認の船があり、救助を拒否しています…救援を申し出てもいないにもかかわらず」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, bana alametlerimizin geminin nereye bağlı olduğunu tespit edemediği bilgisi iletildi. Özet geçmek gerekirse Rykadi Philia kolonisinin yakınlarındaki bir asteroit bölgesinde tanımlanamayan, ağır hasarlı bir gemi var ve yardımımızı reddediyorlar. Şunu da not etmem gerekiyor: Henüz yardım teklifinde bulunmamıştık."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I am told our augurs cannot determine the allegiance of the vessel. To be brief, there is an unidentified and badly damaged vessel within an asteroid field near the Rykadi Philia colony that is refusing help... Which, not to put too fine a point on it, has not yet been offered to them."
